dcterms:creator: M. Fragkiadakis
V. Nyst
M. Nyarko
dcterms:description: A lexicon consisting of 1200 signs from one signer, compiled for educational purposes to be used in a mobile application.
dcterms:title: Ghanaian Sign Language lexicon (GSL)

dcterms:creator: M. Fragkiadakis
V. Nyst
P. van der Putten
dcterms:description: Data gathered from ten participants performing the same 20 signs in front of a webcam, used to compare different algorithms.
dcterms:title: Data gathered by Fragkiadakis et al. (2020)

dcterms:creator: J. E. Y. Vidalón
J. M. D. Martino
dcterms:description: A dataset of 107 signs used for Brazilian Sign Language recognition, reported to achieve approximately 98% accuracy.
dcterms:title: Data-set of 107 signs (used by Vidalón and Martino)

dcterms:creator: D. Metaxas
M. Dilsizian
C. Neidle
dcterms:description: A dataset of 350 ASL signs used to develop a linguistically-driven framework for sign recognition.
dcterms:title: Data-set of 350 ASL signs (used by Metaxas et al.)

dcterms:creator: H. Wang
A. Stefan
S. Moradi
V. Athitsos
C. Neidle
F. Kamangar
dcterms:description: A dataset of 1113 signs used for a system designed for large vocabulary sign search.
dcterms:title: Data-set of 1113 signs (used by Wang et al.)

dcterms:creator: M. Fragkiadakis
V. Nyst
P. van der Putten
dcterms:description: A dataset of 20 signs performed by participants, used in the study by Fragkiadakis et al. (2020) for algorithm comparison.
dcterms:title: Data-set of 20 signs (used in Fragkiadakis et al. (2020))
